```
[
  '(:action acquire_gems
       :parameters (?p - player)
       :precondition (not (acquired ?p gems))
       :effect (acquired ?p gems)
   )',
  '(:action select_area
       :parameters (?p - player ?a - area)
       :precondition (not (selected ?p ?a))
       :effect (selected ?p ?a)
   )',
  '(:action acquire
       :parameters (?p - player ?item - object)
       :precondition (and (available ?p) (not (acquired ?p ?item)))
       :effect (acquired ?p ?item)
   )',
  '(:action select
       :parameters (?actor - player ?resource - object)
       :precondition (and 
           (not (selected ?actor ?resource))
           (or (in_store ?resource) (not (exists (selected ?actor ?resource))))
       )
       :effect (and 
           (selected ?actor ?resource)
           (when (in_store ?resource) (not (in_store ?resource)))
       )
   )',
  '(:action make
       :parameters (?p - player ?entity - entity ?resource - object)
       :precondition (and (selected ?p area) (not (created ?entity)))
       :effect (created ?entity)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?actor - player ?target - entity ?context - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?actor) (related ?actor ?target ?context) (not (achieved ?actor ?target ?context)))
       :effect (achieved ?actor ?target ?context)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?player - player ?gems - object ?game - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?player) (related ?player ?gems ?game) (not (achieved ?player ?gems ?game)))
       :effect (achieved ?player ?gems ?game)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?player - player ?area - location ?game - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?player) (related ?player ?area ?game) (not (achieved ?player ?area ?game)))
       :effect (achieved ?player ?area ?game)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?player - player ?items - purchase ?store - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?player) (related ?player ?items ?store) (not (achieved ?player ?items ?store)))
       :effect (achieved ?player ?items ?store)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?player - player ?kids_room - location ?home - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?player) (related ?player ?kids_room ?home) (not (achieved ?player ?kids_room ?home)))
       :effect (achieved ?player ?kids_room ?home)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?player - player ?room - section ?house - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?player) (related ?player ?room ?house) (not (achieved ?player ?room ?house)))
       :effect (achieved ?player ?room ?house)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?player - player ?outside_area - location ?property - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?player) (related ?player ?outside_area ?property) (not (achieved ?player ?outside_area ?property)))
       :effect (achieved ?player ?outside_area ?property)
   )',
  '(:action keep
       :parameters (?player - player ?family - group ?home - context)
       :precondition (and (valid ?player) (related ?player ?family ?home) (not (achieved ?player ?family ?home)))
       :effect (achieved ?player ?family ?home)
   )'
]
```
